page.title: 11NEWMILLS
page.content: The small village of Newmills lies between Torryburn and High Valleyfield. It is mainly one long street, built on a hill.The village is fairly quiet.It has two hairdressers shops, a video shop,a joiners,a newsagents and a butcher.As it lies on {the main route for Glasgow and High {Valleyfield buses from Dunfermline, most people will shop there. {The Police Station} here serves the surrounding villages of High Valleyfield, Low Valleyfield, Culross, Cairneyhill, Crombie, Limekilns and Charlestown. There are{two pubs in Newmills.}One,} the Crown was once a Hotel.
